title: Excel help & learning
content:
### You’re invited to try Microsoft 365 for free

[Unlock now](https://www.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/buy/compare-all-microsoft-365-products?ocid=cmm1qycerth)

Sign in with Microsoft

Sign in or create an account.

Hello,

Select a different account.

You have multiple accounts

Choose the account you want to sign in with.

![Screenshot shows Copilot in Excel identifying insights from existing data.](https://support.microsoft.com/images/en-us/e656529d-1dd8-4f5f-896f-610c7bd9b5d6)

## Analyze, understand, and visualize your data with ease

Copilot in Excel helps you generate formulas, analyze and summarize data, and add helpful visuals to spreadsheets.

[Get started with Copilot in Excel](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/get-started-with-copilot-in-excel-d7110502-0334-4b4f-a175-a73abdfc118a)

[Identify insights with Copilot in Excel](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/get-insights-about-numerical-data-with-copilot-in-excel-52d97339-86c0-431c-b46c-e7b07b2898dd)

[Generate formulas with Copilot in Excel](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/generate-formula-rows-and-columns-with-copilot-in-excel-d866d926-9791-4e5f-be2a-c6dd9e587a47)

**Get AI-powered features in Microsoft 365**

[Buy Microsoft 365](https://www.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/buy/compare-all-microsoft-365-products?ocid=cmmfy5naqo3)

## Explore Excel

![allowance tracker and probate templates](https://support.microsoft.com/images/en-us/d0c20eef-5ee9-4f75-84b7-81967608c92c)

### Find Excel templates

Bring your ideas to life and streamline your work by starting with professionally designed, fully customizable templates from Microsoft Create.

[Find customizable templates to take your project to the next level](https://create.microsoft.com/)

![Couple in cafe looking at Excel chart](https://support.microsoft.com/images/en-us/cdaf1ed0-6669-4536-83ff-7b5e63ae6fdb)

### Analyze Data

Ask questions about your data without having to write complicated formulas. Not available in all locales.

[Use Analyze Data to make data analysis simpler, faster, and more intuitive](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/analyze-data-in-excel-3223aab8-f543-4fda-85ed-76bb0295ffc4)

![Laptop displaying a productivity application on a white desk with a vase, a notebook, and a pen, with an orange lamp and chair in the background](https://support.microsoft.com/images/en-us/003e6cfd-fa09-41fc-93e5-56af2965c9ec)

### Are you a small business?

Visit the small business help & learning page to learn how you can use Microsoft 365 in your small business.

[Explore ways to help your small business grow, finish projects faster, and do more](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2224585)

![Symbol of PC with colored circular arrows around it](https://support.microsoft.com/images/en-us/197df368-483b-4c72-9664-1aff80b0865a)

### Support for Excel 2016 and Excel 2019 has ended

Learn what end of support means and how to upgrade to Microsoft 365.

[Get details about the end of support for Office 2016 and Office 2019](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/end-of-support-for-office-2016-and-office-2019-818c68bc-d5e5-47e5-b52f-ddf636cf8e16)

## Trending topics

**What's new**

[Use XLOOKUP to find what you need](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/xlookup-function-b7fd680e-6d10-43e6-84f9-88eae8bf5929)

[Work with stocks and geography data](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/excel-data-types-stocks-and-geography-61a33056-9935-484f-8ac8-f1a89e210877)

[Turn your data into insights](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/analyze-data-in-excel-3223aab8-f543-4fda-85ed-76bb0295ffc4)

**Use functions**

[List of all Excel functions available](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/excel-functions-alphabetical-b3944572-255d-4efb-bb96-c6d90033e188)

[VLOOKUP function](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/vlookup-function-0bbc8083-26fe-4963-8ab8-93a18ad188a1)

[IF function](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/if-function-69aed7c9-4e8a-4755-a9bc-aa8bbff73be2)

**Customize your data**

[Create a drop-down list](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/create-a-drop-down-list-7693307a-59ef-400a-b769-c5402dce407b)

[Combine text from two or more cells](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/combine-text-from-two-or-more-cells-into-one-cell-in-microsoft-excel-81ba0946-ce78-42ed-b3c3-21340eb164a6)

[Freeze panes to lock rows & columns](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/freeze-panes-to-lock-rows-and-columns-dab2ffc9-020d-4026-8121-67dd25f2508f)

**Analyze with PivotTables**

[Create a PivotTable to analyze worksheet data](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/create-a-pivottable-to-analyze-worksheet-data-a9a84538-bfe9-40a9-a8e9-f99134456576)

[Design the layout and format of a PivotTable](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/design-the-layout-and-format-of-a-pivottable-a9600265-95bf-4900-868e-641133c05a80)

[Sort data in a PivotTable or PivotChart](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/sort-data-in-a-pivottable-or-pivotchart-e41f7107-b92d-44ef-861f-24430830450a)

## Follow your stocks

Use linked data types to track and analyze stock data. Or analyze trends based on geographical locales.

[Get stock market and geographic data types in Excel](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/excel-data-types-stocks-and-geography-61a33056-9935-484f-8ac8-f1a89e210877)

![Woman looking at Excel screen](https://support.microsoft.com/images/en-us/66c273cb-5ade-468e-b4e6-35b622d1b5d7)
